segments.text: Hello , I would like to make an appointment to look at houses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , would you prefer looking in the morning or afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you go during the week , or can you only go during the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Going to look at houses during the week is best for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where would you like me to pick you up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will meet you at the real estate office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am thinking of looking at three houses , and it will take about two hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Once I contact the owners and confirm the times , I will e-mail you a schedule .
segments.speaker: S2
